color.$description: Used for the foreground of a disabled action.

default.$description: Used for the default background color.

subtle.$description: Used to slightly differentiate the background from the default.

strong.$description: Used to make the background easily stand out from the default.

disabled.$description: Used to identify a disabled section.

overlap.$description: Used for components, like tooltips and drawers, and content, like a sticky header, that overlap other content.

section.$description: Used for containers, like a card header, that are visually distinct from the default page background only when necessary to maintain affordance and hierarchy in different modes.

overlay.$description: Used for an overlay that covers other content.

default.$description: Used for the default border color.

subtle.$description: Used for a subtle border in combination with the default background.

strong.$description: Used for a distinct border that emphasizes an edge or boundaries.

section.$description: Used for the border color that surrounds content or elements when they appear as a closed container or closed section of the page.

transparent.$description: Used when a border needs to be present, but not visibly perceived.

default.$description: Used for form control (input, radio button, checkbox, textarea) default background.

disabled.$description: Used for disabled form control (checkbox, input, radio button, textarea) background.

concatenation.$description: Used for the background of static content that prepends or appends a text input.

readonly.$description: Used for the background of static content that prepends or appends a text input.

default.$description: Used for checked and indeterminate (selected) form control (checkbox, radio button) background.

hover.$description: Used for checked and indeterminate (selected) form control (checkbox, radio button) background on hover.

focus.$description: Used for checked and indeterminate (selected) form control (checkbox, radio button) background on hover.

default.$description: Used for form control (input, radio button, checkbox, textarea) default border.

hover.$description: Used for form control (input, radio button, checkbox, textarea) border on hover.

focus.$description: Used for form control (input, radio button, checkbox, textarea) border on focus.

disabled.$description: Used for disabled form control (input, radio button, checkbox, textarea) border.

error.$description: Used for invalid form control (input, textarea) border.

default.$description: Used for checked and indeterminate (selected) form control (checkbox, radio button) border.

hover.$description: Used for checked and indeterminate (selected) form control (checkbox, radio button) border on hover.

focus.$description: Used for checked and indeterminate (selected) form control (checkbox, radio button) border on focus.

error.$description: Used for the helper text when the input is invalid.

valid.$description: Used for the helper text when the input is valid.

color.$description: Used for placeholder text within inputs.

selected.$description: Used for checkbox and radio button state indicators.

disabled.$description: Used for disabled checkbox and radio button state indicators.

color.$description: Used for a background associated with strong feedback like a tooltip or toast message.
Used for text on a strong feedback background.
Used for an icon on a strong feedback background.
Used for a link on a strong feedback background.
Used for the background of a neutral feedback item when there isn't a specific meaning or urgency.
Used for the text of a neutral feedback item when there isn't a specific meaning or urgency.
Used for the icon of a neutral feedback item when there isn't a specific meaning or urgency.
Used for the background of an informational feedback item when highlighting new information or a change that doesn't require immediate action.
Used for the text of an informational feedback item when highlighting new information or a change that doesn't require immediate action.
Used for the icon of an informational feedback item when highlighting new information or a change that doesn't require immediate action.
Used for the background of a success feedback item when confirming the successful completion of a user-initiated action.
Used for the text of a success feedback item when confirming the successful completion of a user-initiated action.
Used for the icon of a success feedback item when confirming the successful completion of a user-initiated action.
Used for the background of a warning feedback item when notifying about a potential issue or sensitive information.
Used for the text of a warning feedback item when notifying about a potential issue or sensitive information.
Used for the icon of a warning feedback item when notifying about a potential issue or sensitive information.
Used for the background of a danger feedback item when notifying about a critical issue that has just occurred and requires immediate attention.
Used for the text of a danger feedback item when notifying about a critical issue that has just occurred and requires immediate attention.
Used for the icon of a danger feedback item when notifying about a critical issue that has just occurred and requires immediate attention.
Used for the outer color portion of the focus ring.
Used for the inner neutral portion of the focus ring.

default.$description: Used for the default icon color. Can be paired with default text.

subtle.$description: Used for a static or decorational icon. Can be paired with subtle text.

strong.$description: Used for an icon with the highest contrast.

disabled.$description: Used for an icon within a disabled section.

link.$description: Used for an icon within a link.

info.$description: Used for an icon associated with information or help.

warning.$description: Used for an icon associated with a warning.

danger.$description: Used for an icon associated with an error or danger.

success.$description: Used for an icon associated with success or validity.

default.$description: Used for the default shadow color.

color.$description: Used for the background of a neutral status item when the status is neither positive nor negative, or when indicating a special but stable state.
Used for the text of a neutral status item when the status is neither positive nor negative, or when indicating a special but stable state.
Used for the icon of a neutral status item when the status is neither positive nor negative, or when indicating a special but stable state.
Used for the background of an informational status item when indicating a noteworthy ongoing condition or a state of active progress.
Used for the text of an informational status item when indicating a noteworthy ongoing condition or a state of active progress.
Used for the icon of an informational status item when indicating a noteworthy ongoing condition or a state of active progress.
Used for the background of a success status item when indicating a positive outcome, completion, or desired state. Clearly conveys a positive connotation.
Used for the text of a success status item when indicating a positive outcome, completion, or desired state. Clearly conveys a positive connotation.
Used for the icon of a success status item when indicating a positive outcome, completion, or desired state. Clearly conveys a positive connotation.

Used for the background of a warning status item when indicating a state that requires heightened awareness or caution, but is not necessarily problematic. Represents a state that warrants extra attention or care when interacting with the item.

Used for the text of a warning status item when indicating a state that requires heightened awareness or caution, but is not necessarily problematic. Represents a state that warrants extra attention or care when interacting with the item.

Used for the icon of a warning status item when indicating a state that requires heightened awareness or caution, but is not necessarily problematic. Represents a state that warrants extra attention or care when interacting with the item.

Used for the background of a danger status item when indicating a critical or severely problematic current state. Clearly conveys a negative connotation, representing a serious, ongoing issue or undesired condition.

Used for the text of a danger status item when indicating a critical or severely problematic current state. Clearly conveys a negative connotation, representing a serious, ongoing issue or undesired condition.

Used for the icon of a danger status item when indicating a critical or severely problematic current state. Clearly conveys a negative connotation, representing a serious, ongoing issue or undesired condition.

Used for the background of a brand-related status item when highlighting the state of unique features or elements specific to the GitLab brand identity. Helps distinguish and emphasize brand-specific elements within the interface.

Used for the text of a brand-related status item when highlighting the state of unique features or elements specific to the GitLab brand identity. Helps distinguish and emphasize brand-specific elements within the interface.

Used for the icon of a brand-related status item when highlighting the state of unique features or elements specific to the GitLab brand identity. Helps distinguish and emphasize brand-specific elements within the interface.

default.$description: Used for the default text color.

subtle.$description: Used for supplemental text that doesn't need to be as prominent as other text.

strong.$description: Used for text with the highest contrast.

warning.$description: Used for text that requires caution or careful attention.

danger.$description: Used for text indicating a problem, critical state, destructive action, error, failure, removal, stop, or declination.

success.$description: Used for text indicating success, completion, approval, addition, or validity.
